attributes.action: reinstate whistleblower nurse Margaret Haywood immediately
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Nurse of 20 years Margaret Haywood was sacked by the Nursing and Midwifery Council for "whistleblowing" about the treatment of elderly patients at the Royal Sussex Hospital. 
 Ms Haywood is being punished for revealing what the NHS wants to keep quiet.
 Ms Haywood should be applauded for making the issue public and those that are seeking to punish her should be sacked as this looks like revenge.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
